com.maxmind.geoip2

Class DatabaseReader.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxmind.geoip2.DatabaseReader.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DatabaseReader

    public static final class DatabaseReader.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Constructs a Builder for the DatabaseReader. The file passed to it must be a valid GeoIP2 database file. Builder creates instances of DatabaseReader from values set by the methods. Only the values set in the Builder constructor are required.

    • Constructor Summary

        public DatabaseReader.Builder fileMode(com.maxmind.db.Reader.FileMode val)
        Parameters:
        val - The file mode used to open the GeoIP2 database
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if you initialized the Builder with a URL, which uses Reader.FileMode.MEMORY, but you provided a different FileMode to this method.

                     throws java.io.IOException
